name: Cucumber Honeydew Salad
author: spcordell
summary: Refreshing and healthy salad perfect for summertime. The sweet of the honeydew balances out the zip of the red onion, the coolness of mint, and finally the slight saltiness. The flavor really develops in waves. I'm always asked for the recipe.
ingredients: 1  honeydew melon - peeled, seeded and cubed
½  lemon, juiced, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Mix together honeydew melon, cucumbers, red onion and mint in a large bowl
Add olive oil and toss to coat
Stir in lemon juice, salt, and pepper to taste
Cover and refrigerate  until chilled, about 40 minutes
